706297f-a.text:
(1)
Plaza Street, from Flatbush to Vanderbilt Aves., showing the Brooklyn Riding and Driving Club. The building in the foreground, is now used as a commercial garage.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also Flatbush Ave., east side, north of Plaza Street.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, showing the Vanderbilt Ave., side of the Brooklyn Riding and Driving Club.
August 2, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
706297f-a.folder: Plaza Street & Vanderbilt Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
